Detailed Description

Presents a large number of functions for doing things with FTP

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

__construct (   $server,
  $user_name,
  $user_pass,
  $dst_dir,
  $port = 21,
  $timeout = 90,
  $debug = false 
)

class constructor. Connects to the FTP server

Parameters
string $server The server to connect to
string $user_name The username at the server
string $user_pass The password at the server
string $dst_dir The directory to connect to
int $port The port to connect to
int $timeout The number of seconds to wait
bool $debug
Returns
__destruct ( )

Destructor. Unsets all object variables

alias for ftp_nlist — Returns a list of files in the given directory

Parameters

fget (   $file_to_write,
  $remote_file,
  $file_mode = 'W',
  $ftp_mode = FTP_ASCII,
  $resume_pos = 0,
  $blocking = true 
)

alias for ftp_fget — Downloads a file from the FTP server and saves to an open file alias for ftp_nb_fget — Retrieves a file from the FTP server and writes it to an open file (non-blocking)

Parameters
string $file_to_write full path to the local file to which we're writing
string $remote_file FTP path to the remote file we're copying from
string $file_mode mode to use on the local file. use http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.fopen.php for reference
int $ftp_mode The transfer mode. Must be either FTP_ASCII or FTP_BINARY.
int $resume_pos The position in the remote file to start downloading from.
bool $blocking Whether to perform blocking. If FALSE, uploads the file asynchronously, so your program can perform other operations while the file is being uploaded.
Returns
bool|int
fput (   $file,
  $file_mode = 'r',
  $ftp_mode = FTP_ASCII,
  $blocking = true 
)

alias for ftp_fput — Uploads from an open file to the FTP server alias for ftp_nb_fput — Stores a file from an open file to the FTP server (non-blocking)

Parameters
string $file full_path to the file to put
string $file_mode mode to use on the local file. use http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.fopen.php for reference
int $ftp_mode The transfer mode. Must be either FTP_ASCII or FTP_BINARY.
bool $blocking Whether to perform blocking. If FALSE, uploads the file asynchronously, so your program can perform other operations while the file is being uploaded.
Returns
bool|int
FTPGetContents (   $remote_file,
  $mode = FTP_ASCII,
  $resume_pos = null 
)

emulates PHP's native file_get_contents. This uses FTP to get the content of a remote file into a string

Parameters
string $remote_file The file to retrieve
int $mode
int $resume_pos The position in the remote file to start downloading from.
Returns
string
get (   $local_file,
  $server_file,
  $mode = FTP_ASCII,
  $resumepos = 0,
  $blocking = true 
)

alias for ftp_get — Downloads a file from the FTP server alias for ftp_nb_get — Retrieves a file from the FTP server and writes it to a local file (non-blocking)

Parameters
string $local_file The local file path (will be overwritten if the file already exists).
string $server_file The remote file path (IOW, the file to get)
int $mode The transfer mode. Must be either FTP_ASCII or FTP_BINARY.
int $resumepos The position in the remote file to start downloading from.
bool $blocking Whether to perform blocking. If FALSE, uploads the file asynchronously, so your program can perform other operations while the file is being uploaded.
Returns
bool
getFTPMode (   $file )

determines, based on the file extension, what the FTP transfer mode should be

Parameters
string $file path to the file
Returns
int

int $option
Returns

nbContinue ( )

alias for ftp_nb_continue — Continues retrieving/sending a file (non-blocking)

Returns
int
pasv (   $on = true )

alias for ftp_pasv — Turns passive mode on or off

Parameters
bool $on whether or not to turn passive mode on
Returns
bool
put (   $remoteFile,
  $localFile,
  $mode = FTP_ASCII,
  $startPos = 0,
  $blocking = true 
)

alias for ftp_put — Uploads a file to the FTP server also alias for ftp_nb_put — Stores a file on the FTP server (non-blocking)

Parameters
string $remoteFile The remote file path. (the destination location)
string $localFile The local file path (the file to put)
int $mode The transfer mode. Must be either FTP_ASCII or FTP_BINARY.
int $startPos The position in the remote file to start uploading to.
bool $blocking Whether to perform blocking. Setting to FALSE uploads the file asynchronously, so your program can perform other operations while the file is being uploaded.
Returns
bool
raw (   $command )

alias for ftp_raw — Sends an arbitrary command to an FTP server

Parameters
string $command
Returns
bool
rawlist (   $dir )

alias for ftp_rawlist — Returns a detailed list of files in the given directory

Parameters
string $dir
Returns
array

creates a multidimensional array of files in a directory including contents of subdirectories

Parameters

Returns
array
